name: Domenico Lembo
content: Domenico Lembo's Home Page Domenico Lembo Full Professor at Dipartimento di Ingegneria Informatica, Automatica e Gestionale "Antonio Ruberti" Facoltà di Ingegneria dell'Informazione, Informatica e Statistica SAPIENZA Università di Roma Contacts Research Publications Teaching Contacts Domenico Lembo Dipartimento di Ingegneria Informatica, Automatica e Gestionale SAPIENZA Università di Roma Via Ariosto, 25 I-00185 Roma, Italy (room B211). Tel: +39-06-77274027 (int. 35027) E-mail: lembo@diag.uniroma1.it http://www.diag.uniroma1.it/~lembo back Research Interests Knowledge Representation and Reasoning Description Logics Database Theory Information Integration Inconsistency-tolerance in Information Systems Controlled Query Evaluation Ontologies Semantic Web Logic Programming Data Warehousing Projects (selection of present and past projects) FAIR POLAR: POLicy specificAtion and enfoRcement for privacy-enhanced data management ADCATER Graphol: a graphical language to represent OWL2 ontology Mastro: A reasoner for Ontology-based Data Access OPTIQUE - Scalable End-user Access to Big Data ACSI: Artifact-Centric Service Interoperation TOCAI.IT: Tecnologie Orientate alla Conoscenza per Aggregazioni di Imprese in Internet - FIRB 2005 project, funded by MIUR (Ministry of Instruction, University and Research) TONES: Thinking ONtologiES - project IST FP6-7603, funded by EU HYPER: How Your Peer Exchange Resources, funded by IBM through the IBM Shared University Research (SUR) program INFOMIX: boosting information integration - project IST-2001-33570, funded by EU D2I: from Data to Information - project partially funded by MIUR (Ministry of Instruction, University and Research) SEWASIE: Semantic Web and Agents in Integrated Economies - project IST-2001-34825funded by EU Organizational Activities General chair of the 33rd Italian Symposium on Advanced Database Systems (SEBD 2025) Co-Head of the Rome office of CAIRNE Program co-chair of the 22nd International Conference of the Italian Association for Artificial Intelligence (AIxIA 2023) Vice-president of the Steering Committee of the International Conference on Web Reasoning and Rule Systems (RR) (since 2024). co-Chair of the 13th Reasoning Web Summer School (RW 2017) Program co-chair of the 23rd Italian Symposium on Advanced Database Systems (SEBD 2015) Guest Editor (together with Wolfgang Faber) of the special issue of the Semantic Web Journal on Web Reasoning and Rule Systems, on the occasion of the 7th International Conference on Web Reasoning and Rule Systems (RR 2013). For this activity the editors have been awarded as exceptional SWJ guest editors for 2014 Program co-chair of the seventh International Conference on Web Reasoning and Rule Systems (RR 2013) General Chair of the Twenty-fifth International Workshop on Description Logics (DL 2012) Publicity and Proceedings chair of the 27th ACM SIGACT SIGMOD SIGART Symposium on Principles of Database Systems (PODS 2008) Program co-chair of the 20th International Workshop on Description Logics (DL 2007) Co-organizer of the Colognet Workshop on Logic-based Methods for Information Integration, Vienna, Austria, August the 23rd,  2003 Tutorials and Talks Keynote Speaker at the 15th Internation Conference on Knowledge Discovery, Knowledge Engineering and Knowledge Management (IC3K) Tutorial on Methods and Tools for Developing Ontology-Based Data Management Solutions, held at SEMANTICS 2018 Speaker at the EDBT Summer School 2017: Adding Value to Data with a lecture on "Data Integration" (together with Alvaro A Fernandes, University of Manchester, UK), Genova, Italy, September 7-11, 2017 Tutorial on Methods and Tools for Developing Ontology-Based Data Access Solutions, held at the 16th International Semantic Web Conference( ISWC 2017) Tutorial on Methodologies for Ontology-Based Data Access Applications, held at the 25th International Joint Conference on Artificial Intelligence ( IJCAI 2016) Tutorial on Description Logics for Data Access, held at the 24th AAAI conference on Artificial Intelligence (AAAI 2010) -- Tutorial syllabus Tutorial on Semantic technologies for data integration using OWL2 QL, held at the 6th European Semantic Web Conference (ESWC 2009). Heraklion, Crete, Greece, May 31, 2009 Tutorial on Ontology-based Data Access, held at the 6th International Semantic Web Conference (ISWC 2007). Busan, Korea, November 11-15, 2007. video: Invited talk on Using OWL in Ontology-based Data Integration at the International Workshop on Business Models, Business Rules and Ontologies (BuRO 2010)
